content: But you do not have examples of vegetarian Muslims trading paneer getting lynched. It is a non-fact you pulled out of god knows from where. To use non-facts to label Hindus as naturally lynchers & Muslims as naturally victims is to be a metabigot, an uberbigot & also a mahabigot.,https://,twitter.com/RanaAyyub/stat,us/1021273927824244736, ,…
Nobody is saying Hindus are naturally lynchers & Muslims victim. But BJP govt is tacitly supporting its supporters who lynch Muslims using cow slaughter as an excuse. Many Hindus enjoy these too.

It benefits Congress and the Christian fundamentalist family heading it to portray its political rival BJP as killing Muslims, because then it will not have to run a development-oriented campaign. Remember who burned Godhra train: it was Congress workers.

See that’s why i call muslims outright liars,they can manufacture hate from anything and you find reasoning for the same..see their futuristic hate creating machine.Muslims were taught to Hate Jews even before Jerusalem was created &all other faiths are Kafirs who should be hated
100 crore Hindu agar sach me mob lyncher hote to kya inki zubaan itni lambi ho paati? Kub k khinch li jaati! Kya samjhe?

She is doing classic taqiya, painting us with the stains of her own community along with trying to washout her community's sins. Just like a a kid points at its innocent neighbour of doing the crime it had done,& trying to make itself out as an angel at the same time.
It is a non-fact that is pulled out along with some hot gas, after digesting some juicy FCRA funds in her stomach.
why are muslim's always caught with illegal beef or stolen cow ?
